reviewText: Short, touching film about what life is like for children in Uganda.
Really an eye opener to the African aids problem and how it affects the young ones. Great story and outcome for these two children
Delivered on time (my rating)  Movie was short and scary at times...would not reccomend for small children.  The movie is an advertisement to pursade u to give money to their organization.

The two children who were on the journey were excellent child actors.  They had to overcome many obstacles to reach their goal.  It was fun watching how they accomplished those tasks.  You will NOT be disappointed.  A lot of sweetness mixed with sadness.
Enjoyed the movie, it was very moving. It was a little short,  but enjoyed sharing with co-workers. I would recommend this product.
